name: Sociable
body:
![](https://github.com/relisher/eMerge/blob/master/app/src/main/res/drawable/logo.png?raw=true)

Sociable lets anyone add new Facebook friends instantly with the snap of a photo.

Combining Facebook login and Facebook Graph API with the face-recognition technology of Kairos, Sociable is an innovative Android app to immediately identify and add other Facebook users by simply taking a picture.

Meet the JJAM Team:
-------------------

[Josh Hellerstein](https://www.linkedin.com/pub/josh-hellerstein/7b/628/252) • [Joe Azar-Williams](https://www.linkedin.com/pub/joe-azar-williams/19/430/b) • [Anton Relin](https://www.twitter.com/russianrelish) • [Matt Liang](https://facebook.com/themattliang)
